entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Exceptions on AuthorizeView net8.0p7 #50129
  • UserManager.IsInRoleAsync(appUser, "rolename") and User.IsInrole("rolename") may return different results #50125
  • Blazor multiple authentication schemes do not play nice with RenderModeServer #50122
  • Header and Footer Inconsistencies (scrolling and transparency issues) #50121
  • Perf regression: fortunes, single_query #50118
  • Perf improvement: json #50117
  • Can't go to the View in Areas #50115
  • Add a DefaultPolicy property on AuthorizeRouteView to be used when no Policies are set on a component #50111
  • Perf regression: caching #50109
  • Perf improvement: mvc, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, plainTextWithFilter #50108
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextSansFilter #50107
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextSansFilter, plainTextWithFilter #50106
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, mapaction, plainTextWithFilter #50105
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, mapaction, plainTextEmptyFilter #50104
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, plainTextWithFilter #50103
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, mapaction, plainTextSansFilter #50102
  • support AttributeUsage AttributeTargets.Class for minimal api handlers #50101
  • `UrlHelperExtensions.Page` from headless code without any `Page` #50099
  • Memory Leak on .Net 7 but not 6 #50097
  • "CreateEmptyBuilder" but a little more robust #50096

Closed

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudGetProductDetails, ApiCrudListProducts #49986
  • Conditional css class syntax in blazor #50035
    Backlog
  • CS0433 The type 'IEmailSender' exists in both 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.UI and Microsoft.Extensions.Identity.Core #50075
  • Referenced pages are not found #50100
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #48861
  • Blazor Server: Read image saved as blob as base 64 string #49552
  • Curious Blazor (Server) Behavior with Html Table Containing Input Elements #50038
  • .NET 8.0.0-preview.7 Blazor Web Template Get Stuck in Loading with Kestrel #50066
  • Inconsistency behaviour between `app.UseExceptionHandler()` and `app.UseExceptionHandler(_=> { })` #50049
  • A11y_.NETCore_ASP.NETCore_About_UseOfColor: Only color is used for "About" link and underline is not provided. #49676
    8.0-rc1
  • Localize standard DataAnnotations in ASP.NET Core MVC #33073
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Perf improvement: json #50086

PullRequests

Created

  • Styling Update for Header and Footer Elements #50130
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add feature to expose IIS hosting details #50128
    area-runtime
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [Blazor] Add APIs for "enhanced refresh" #50124
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor
  • Fix IndexOutOfRangeException when an added/removed attribute spans a buffer size boundary #50110
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2

Merged

  • Update Helix to Fedora 38 #50123
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Move Symreader dependency to ToolsetDependencies #50116
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix typo in src/Security/Authentication/Core/src/AuthenticationHandle… #50114
    area-security, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • [blazor][E2E test] BootResourceCachingTest.IncrementallyUpdatesCache faster #50021
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2245323 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Support resolving keyed services from DI in RDF and RDG #50095
    Servicing-consider, feature-rdg, area-minimal, feature-rdf
  • [SignalR][TS client] Stateful reconnect #49940
    area-signalr, feature-client-javascript
  • [SignalR] Pass new App to Transport Pipe to App layer #49650
    area-signalr
  • Support hot reload for Blazor component endpoints #50031
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Add APIs for "enhanced refresh" #50068
    area-blazor
  • Add support for F# `Async<'T>` as an awaitable type in minimal APIs #46898
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • Stateful Reconnect API changes #50092
    area-signalr
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-rc.1.23407.2 #49911
    area-infrastructure
